channel.title: tests on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in tests on Barefoot Rob

item.title: work is going faster with tests
item.description: 10:23 Monday 18 February 2019 JST Although I have not gotten all the way to the part of MLAPHP that we are supposed to be adding tests, I am close enough that I can add some tests. They have helped a lot, like OMG how did I live without tests? It hasn’t been so long that I don’t remember what it was like, and I sure like this better.
